amendment.description: To prohibit reprogramming requests of the Department of Defense for funds for the transfer or release, or construction for the transfer or release, of individuals detained at United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4119 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4119 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Roberts. (consideration: CR S3488-3490; text: CR S3490) To prohibit reprogramming requests of the Department of Defense for funds for the transfer or release, or construction for the transfer or release, of individuals detained at United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4119 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Roberts.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4119 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
